meanings.definition: A person or thing that zones.
meanings.sent1: The city council hired more zoners to help with urban planning.
meanings.sent2: The zoners in the neighborhood were responsible for dividing the area into residential and commercial zones.
meanings.sent3: The zoners at the town hall meeting were very strict about enforcing the zoning laws.
meanings.sent4: She was a true zoners, always focused on organizing and planning.
meanings.sent5: The zoners carefully mapped out the different zones in the city, ensuring proper land use.

meanings.sent1: The team of zoners worked together to create a new zoning map for the town.
meanings.sent2: The zoners gathered for a meeting to discuss the upcoming zoning changes.
meanings.sent3: The zoners decided to have a zoning party to celebrate their successful zoning project.
meanings.sent4: In the land of zoners, everyone understood the importance of zoning regulations.
meanings.sent5: The zoners were known for their expertise in zoning laws and regulations.
